sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Col, Container, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Page from "../components/Page"; import ResumeModal from "../components/ResumeModal"; import styles from "../css/About.module.css"; import useAuth from "../hooks/useAuth"; const About = () => { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); const {} = useAuth(); const handleClick = () => { setModalShow(true); }; return ( Personal Statement If it involves problem solving, exploring logical approaches, learning new systems, and working on a team of people as eager as I am to find solutions, count me in! Professional Experience
Mater Academy Charter High School
  • Advanced Placement Chemistry Teacher
  • August 2019 - August 2021
HomeDepot
  • Contractor Services Manager
  • May 2013 - February 2015
 Education
University of Florida
  • Bachelor of Science in Chemistry
  • Awarded Cum Laude - GPA: 3.81 of 4.00
  • Graduation Date: December 2018
 Skills
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Effective verbal communication and interpretation of abstract data
  • Fluent in Spanish
 ); }; export default About;
